{
    "sql": "SELECT * FROM table FORMAT CapnProto SETTINGS format_capn_proto_use_autogenerated_schema=1, output_format_schema='schema.capnp';",
    "Affected Elements": "CapnProto, format_capn_proto_use_autogenerated_schema, output_format_schema",
    "Root Cause Analysis": "The system fails to generate valid CapnProto schemas when column names contain underscores instead of being in CamelCase, leading to parsing errors."
}
